Intro.content: Today we want to create some conflict for our test subject.
By scattering predators throughout the island, we force the test subject to confront the "other"
Place 15 predators and then we can begin.
The meek crab barely presents a challenge.
But for a formidable foe, the wild boar will suffice.
Feel free to mix and match however it may please.

Main1 (After 15 placed).content: Now the test subject must defend themself.
Place either a stone or a stick.
Leave it further from the test subject to give an extra challenge.
Or closer to make things easy.

Complete - Easy.content: A bit too easy for the test subject I see.
A lack of conflict implies a lack of purpose.

Complete - Hard.content: A tough challenge for the test subject I see.
Take care to create disorder, but not abject chaos.

Outro.content: So we see, conflict brings about a further separation of one from the "other"
Friends draw closer together. But enemies push each other apart.
Without looking too closely, the test subject will take this to heart.
